preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(relname) AS SEQUENCE_NAME FROM pg_class, pg_namespace WHERE relkind='S' AND pg_class.relnamespace = pg_namespace.oid AND relname ILIKE 'opennmsnxtid'
